com.thorgaming.throwme.displayobjects
Class DispObj

java.lang.Object
  com.thorgaming.throwme.displayobjects.DispObj
Direct Known Subclasses:
Character, Circle, DispRes, HUD, Launcher, PowerInfo, Rect, ScoreRow, Text
public abstract class DispObj
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class that represents an object that can be drawn on screen

Version:
1.0
Author:
Thomas Cheyney

          Alpha value to display at, between 0 and 255
